history.provenance: Acquisition: Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile; his manuscript no. 93: inscribed, folio 1r; his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum in October 1865 for £1,000 (see 131-153): inscribed (folio [112v]).
